flavor: The most potent scripts are indistinguishable from magic to the sysop on the other side.
printed_text: Run Archives. If successful, whenever you would access a faceup piece of ice in Archives this run, you may instead trash 1 rezzed copy of that ice. Use this ability only once this run.
stripped_printed_text: Run Archives. If successful, whenever you would access a faceup piece of ice in Archives this run, you may instead trash 1 rezzed copy of that ice. Use this ability only once this run.

flavor: The implanted brain-machine interface, or "skulljack," is the single most common cybernetic enhancement that isn't a medical necessity.
printed_text:
When you install Skulljack, suffer 1 brain damage.
The trash cost of all cards is lowered by 1.
stripped_printed_text: When you install Skulljack, suffer 1 brain damage. The trash cost of all cards is lowered by 1.

printed_text: +1[mu] Whenever you steal an agenda, you may swap that agenda with an agenda in the Corp's score area. Limit 1 console per player.
stripped_printed_text: +1 mu Whenever you steal an agenda, you may swap that agenda with an agenda in the Corp's score area. Limit 1 console per player.

flavor: Picking a chopper might be the last decision you make. If you find a good one, stick with her for life.
printed_text: Prevent all meat damage and brain damage from installing cybernetics.
stripped_printed_text: Prevent all meat damage and brain damage from installing cybernetics.

printed_text:
When you install Titanium Ribs, suffer 2 meat damage.
You choose the card(s) from your grip to trash whenever you take damage (including the damage taken by installing Titanium Ribs).
stripped_printed_text: When you install Titanium Ribs, suffer 2 meat damage. You choose the card(s) from your grip to trash whenever you take damage (including the damage taken by installing Titanium Ribs).

printed_text: If you have at least 2[link], the memory cost of this program is 0[mu], even if it is not installed. This program gets +1 strength for each installed icebreaker. Interface → [trash]: Break up to 3 code gate subroutines.
stripped_printed_text: If you have at least 2 link, the memory cost of this program is 0 mu, even if it is not installed. This program gets +1 strength for each installed icebreaker. Interface -> trash: Break up to 3 code gate subroutines.

printed_text: When you install Net-Ready Eyes, suffer 2 meat damage. Whenever you initiate a run, choose an icebreaker. That icebreaker has +1 strength for the remainder of the run.
stripped_printed_text: When you install Net-Ready Eyes, suffer 2 meat damage. Whenever you initiate a run, choose an icebreaker. That icebreaker has +1 strength for the remainder of the run.

flavor: Sometimes progress means returning to the past.
printed_text: [click]: Run R&D. If successful, instead of breaching R&D, you may choose 1 unrezzed non-ice card with no advancement counters on it. The Corp shuffles that card into R&D.
stripped_printed_text: click: Run R&D. If successful, instead of breaching R&D, you may choose 1 unrezzed non-ice card with no advancement counters on it. The Corp shuffles that card into R&D.

flavor: The skull is not one bone, but 22. The surgery is even more complex than it sounds.
printed_text:
When you install Brain Cage, suffer 1 brain damage.
Your maximum hand size is increased by 3.
stripped_printed_text: When you install Brain Cage, suffer 1 brain damage. Your maximum hand size is increased by 3.

printed_text: Each player's maximum hand size is reduced by 1.
stripped_printed_text: Each player's maximum hand size is reduced by 1.

flavor: Cyber enhancements can be dangerous in the wrong hands.
printed_text: The Runner's maximum hand size is reduced by 1.
stripped_printed_text: The Runner's maximum hand size is reduced by 1.

flavor: "Remember those FCC regulations about not creating harmful interference? No? Ah, before your time, I guess." -Cailan Heinrich, Senior Programmer
printed_text: [subroutine] The Runner trashes an installed piece of hardware. Trash Lab Dog.
stripped_printed_text: Subroutine The Runner trashes an installed piece of hardware. Trash Lab Dog.

printed_text: The trash cost of each card in the root of this server is increased by 3. Limit 1 region per server.
stripped_printed_text: The trash cost of each card in the root of this server is increased by 3. Limit 1 region per server.

flavor: "Bioroids recognize consciousness in others, but not in themselves."
printed_text: [trash]: Do 1 brain damage. Use this ability only during a run on this server and only if the Runner has no unspent clicks.
stripped_printed_text: trash: Do 1 brain damage. Use this ability only during a run on this server and only if the Runner has no unspent clicks.

printed_text: [subroutine] You and the Runner secretly spend 0[credit], 1[credit], or 2[credit]. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, place 1 advancement token on an installed card and end the run.
stripped_printed_text: Subroutine You and the Runner secretly spend 0 credits, 1 credit, or 2 credits. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, place 1 advancement token on an installed card and end the run.

flavor: "When your communications are disrupted, you are isolated from your resources. An attack will surely follow." -The Playbook
printed_text: [subroutine] The Runner cannot draw cards for the remainder of this turn.
stripped_printed_text: Subroutine The Runner cannot draw cards for the remainder of this turn.

flavor: "A sysop is not just a cog in the corporate machine. They have dreams—and nightmares—just like the rest of us." -Kate "Mac" McCaffrey
printed_text:
[subroutine] End the run.
[subroutine] End the run.
[subroutine] The Runner gains 5[credit].
stripped_printed_text: Subroutine End the run. Subroutine End the run. Subroutine The Runner gains 5 credits.

printed_text: Install only faceup. (This agenda is neither rezzed nor unrezzed.) Whenever you advance this agenda, gain 2[credit]. If there are 5 or more hosted advancement counters (including the counter just placed), gain 3[credit] instead.
stripped_printed_text: Install only faceup. (This agenda is neither rezzed nor unrezzed.) Whenever you advance this agenda, gain 2 credits. If there are 5 or more hosted advancement counters (including the counter just placed), gain 3 credits instead.

flavor: If you can't buy the city council, create a new city.
printed_text:
As an additional cost to rez this asset, forfeit 1 agenda.
When your turn begins, you may trash 1 installed resource. Trashing a resource this way cannot be prevented.
stripped_printed_text: As an additional cost to rez this asset, forfeit 1 agenda. When your turn begins, you may trash 1 installed resource. Trashing a resource this way cannot be prevented.

printed_text:
When the Runner encounters Quicksand, place 1 power counter on Quicksand.
Quicksand has +1 strength for each power counter on it.
[subroutine] End the run.
stripped_printed_text: When the Runner encounters Quicksand, place 1 power counter on Quicksand. Quicksand has +1 strength for each power counter on it. Subroutine End the run.
